sentences.sContent: It was strings of words borrowed from the different languages around them and put together in sort of haphazard ways.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was strings of words borrowed from the different languages around them and put together in sort of haphazard ways.
sentences.sCn: 它只不过是从身边的不同语言当中,借用了一些单词串,以随意的方式将它们放在一起

sentences.sContent: All the master had to do was shake the tree a little and the garden was full of leaves again, spread out in haphazard patterns.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the master had to do was shake the tree a little and the garden was full of leaves again, spread out in haphazard patterns.
sentences.sCn: 大师什么都没有做，只是摇了摇树。 花园又重新被凋落的树叶覆盖了，整个花园展现出随意的样式。

synos.tran: 偶然的；随便的；无计划的

remMethod.val: hap(机会， 运气) + hazard(冒险) → 运气加冒险， 就能成功 → 偶然情况 → 无计划的
